about_the_game:
Strategy is the key component in this roundbased battle simulation. You are in the role of managing your army as well as the economie and the reseach which create the base of your progress

It is all about the best plan! Do you focus on a fast research, try to build as much troups as possible or just be faster then your opponent? Everything can work if well executed and you need to surprise with your moves and attacks

Upgrading your troups by combining them together can give you the advantage you need to win a key battle!

Winning battles against other players gives you ranking points. You can climb up the leaderboard, if you win consistently.

Build your own maps and play on them in custom games against your friends!

Let the battle beginn!

content_descriptors.notes: The theme of the game is set in a war simulation, but focused around the strategic and planning aspect of a battle. You will see words like Tank or Troup, but there will be no explosions or real deaths!

short_description: You want to create your own battleplan? Keep the overview and outplay your opponent with brilliant moves! Manage your economy and research whisly to create the perfect composition of units which defeat the opponent and his army, but be carefull: The opponent will try the same!
